outline:
1. to quake, shake
    1. (Qal) to quake, shake
    2. (Niphal) to be made to quake
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to quake
      2. to cause to spring or leap (of horse)
kjv_def: make afraid, (re-) move, quake, (make to) shake, (make to) tremble.
strongs_def: to undulate (as the earth, the sky, etc.; also a field of grain), particularly through fear; specifically, to spring (as a locust)
